OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_ID.description: A unique UUIDv4 identifier for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

STIXIFY_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the Stixify API.

STIXIFY_DOSSIER_IDS.description: A list of Stixify Dossier IDs. Reports (and extracted objects) contained in these dossiers will be imported into OpenCTI. You do not need to own a dossier, but it must be visible to the team associated with the API key.

STIXIFY_INTERVAL_HOURS.description: Polling interval in hours. The connector polls Stixify for new reports in the configured dossier(s) at this interval. The minimum (and recommended) value is 1.
